name: Ｓｔｕｄｙ Ｂｒｅａｋ
description:
Study Break

A Lofi Hip Hop study puzzle game

Controls and Gameplay:

  • Keyboard 
    • a/d - movement
    • space - jump
    • tab - switch character
    • e - interact
    • r - rewind level
    • escape - pause game

Work together to get back to studying

Created by: Horizon Drift

Game Jam: Kiwi Game Jam 2019

Credits

Developers

  • Jordan Cleeve
  • Matthew Burr
  • Josh Thieme
  • Sean Preddy
  • Callum Gubb

Music Composition / Sound
